resources.string: I need some permissions to run. Please click the green button to grant them. You can click on the \"Why?\" button for the reason why I need those.
You need to grant me permissions to continue.
And finally I need a name for your phone of your choosing, so macOS knows who it is talking to.
Welcome to the first time setup of Hotspot Menubar!
Hotspot Menubar needs to figure out how good the signal quality to your phone carrier is. To do this it needs the permission to make and manage phone calls.
Connected macOS devices can now see this phone\'s signal strength.
If you enable your hotspot, connected macOS devices can see this phone\'s signal strength.
Hotspot menu bar icon is active
To connect a macOS device, download the hotspot menu bar item app on your Mac:
Download on the Mac App Store
